dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 1350 RH: To modify the boundary of Voyageurs National Park in the State of Minnesota, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Nolan introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources
Committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union and ordered to be printed

form.official-title: To modify the boundary of Voyageurs National Park in the State of Minnesota, and for other purposes.

paragraph.text: Section 102(a) of Public Law 91–661 (16 U.S.C. 160a–1(a)) is amended—

subparagraph.text: in the first sentence, by striking the drawing entitled and all that follows through February 1969 and inserting the map entitled Voyageurs National Park, Proposed Land Transfer & Boundary Adjustment, numbered 172/80,056, and dated June 2009 (22 sheets); and
in the second and third sentences, by striking drawing each place it appears and inserting map.

paragraph.text: Section 102(b)(2)(A) of Public Law 91–661 (16 U.S.C. 160a–1(b)(2)(A)) is amended—

subparagraph.text: by striking paragraph (1)(C) and (D) and inserting subparagraphs (C) and (D) of paragraph (1); and
in the second proviso, by striking paragraph 1(E) and inserting paragraph (1)(E).

subsection.text: Section 201 of Public Law 91–661 (16 U.S.C. 160b) is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking the section designation and heading and all that follows through (a) The Secretary and inserting the following:

subparagraph.text: in the second sentence, by striking When any tract of land is only partly within such boundaries and inserting the following:
In any case in which only a portion of a tract of land is within the boundaries of the park
in the third sentence, by striking Land so acquired and inserting the following:

clause.text: Any land acquired pursuant to subparagraph (A)

subparagraph.text: in the fourth sentence, by striking Any portion and inserting the following:
in the fifth sentence, by striking Any Federal property and inserting the following:
by striking the last sentence and inserting the following:
Effective beginning on the date of enactment of this subparagraph, there is transferred to the National Park Service administrative jurisdiction over—

clause.text: any land managed by the Bureau of Land Management within the boundaries of the park, as depicted on the map described in section 102(a); and
any additional public land identified by the Bureau of Land Management as appropriate for transfer within the boundaries of the park.

Any land located within or adjacent to the boundaries of the park that is owned by the State of Minnesota (or a political subdivision of the State) may be acquired by the Secretary only through donation or exchange.
On completion of an acquisition from the State under clause (i), the Secretary shall revise the boundaries of the park to reflect the acquisition.

paragraph.text: in subsection (b), by striking (b) In exercising his and inserting the following:

endorsement.action-desc: Committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union and ordered to be printed
